summary: WBC Credit Cards Black Qantas - NBA Campaign
description:
h2. Campaign Overview

*Campaign Name:* WBC Credit Cards Black Qantas
*Content Owner:* Bruce Da Silva
*Brand:* WBC
*Division:* C - Consumer
*Portfolio:* CC - Credit Cards

h2. Campaign Details

*Start Date:* ASAP
*End Date:* Always on
*Campaign Type:* Sales Trigger - Sales/Utilisation targeting based on customer intent, behavioural data, transactional data, lifecycle of product.
*Marketing or Service:* Marketing
*MDC Risk Rating:* High

h2. User Story

As a customer, I want easy access to up-to-date Westpac credit card offers so that I can confidently select the product that best supports my short-term borrowing requirements.

h2. Hypothesis

By promoting the Altitude Black card to customers, we can increase product awareness and improve the likelihood that they will apply.

h2. Campaign Success Metric

Increase CC Sales/App Completes

h2. Forecast (July '25)

||Metric||Value||
|UVs|2.5k|
|Clicks|488|
|App starts|96|
|App completes|68|
|Forecasted monthly sales|70|

h2. Audience

*Description:* Customers who have viewed 'Rewards Qantas' product pages in the last 15 Days

*Campaign Inclusions:*
{code}aam:onsite:wbc:cc:AltitudeQantasBlack-PagesViewed:15D{code}

*Campaign Exclusions:*
{code}
aam:onsite:wbc:cons:cc:AllCreditCards:app-completes:10D
aam:onsite:wbc:cons:cc:hamal:AllCreditCards:app-completes:10D
aam:onsite:WBCCustomerExclns:UniversalCampaign
aam:onsite:WBCCustomerExclns:CreditCardSpecific
{code}

acceptance:
- Given a customer has viewed 'Rewards Qantas' product pages in the last 15 days, when they log into online banking, then they should see the Altitude Black card promotion.
- Given the promotion is displayed, when the customer clicks 'View offer', then they should be directed to the Altitude Qantas Black landing page.
- Given the campaign is live, when measuring performance, then UVs should trend toward 2.5k monthly with approximately 70 forecasted sales.
- Given a customer has completed a credit card application in the last 10 days, when they log in, then they should NOT see this promotion (exclusion rule).
